 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְוֻצּוֺת‎</span>] **noun feminine plural** ==locks of hair== (√ obscure; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>3556</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hair over forehead***); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְוֻצּוֺתַי‎</span> [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָיו‎</span>- v[[Song.5.11|Song 5:11]].
